data.actual_result: It'll allow you to paste the text even though you can't send any messages
data.expected_result: The Paste-popup shouldn't appear and you shouldn't be able to paste text here
data.short_description: Can paste text into channels where you don't have permission
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you have text copied to your clipboard - Jump to a channel where you dont have permission to send messages through Search or QS (do NOT simply go to the channel through the channel list, this doesn't work - Long press the chat input box - Try pasting the text
